## Review Project 

- Approval Due 04/19
    - Note: *Approval*, not proposal (don't wait until the last minute)
- Project Due 05/17

## Review Project

- Perform a "peer review" of a published article
    - Pre-prints are ok
- Article must:
    - Use substantial statistical/quantitative methods
    - Be in your broad area of expertise
- Focus on the statistical / analytical aspects

## Guidelines for Reviews

- Follow the [Proc B Guidelines for Reviewers](http://rspb.royalsocietypublishing.org/for-reviewers)
    - Focus on the statistical guidelines.  
- You may consider the scope of the journal in which the article is published instead of Proc B
